RakNet::CDKey_Use

RakNet::CDKey_Use Struct Reference
[Lobby2Commands]

Associates a cd key with a user, such that the cd key cannot be used again. If Client_Login() is called with check cd key as true, then this table will be checked to make sure UserCDKey() was previously called with this user and a valid key. If this user is already associated with a CD Key, add the new key, and use the most recent key. All CD Key usage should be logged in a separate table, including the date used and result. More...

#include <Lobby2Message.h>

virtual bool PrevalidateInput (void)

Detailed Description

Associates a cd key with a user, such that the cd key cannot be used again. If Client_Login() is called with check cd key as true, then this table will be checked to make sure UserCDKey() was previously called with this user and a valid key. If this user is already associated with a CD Key, add the new key, and use the most recent key. All CD Key usage should be logged in a separate table, including the date used and result.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool RakNet::CDKey_Use::CancelOnDisconnect ( void   )  const [inline, virtual]

Should this message not be processed on the server if the requesting user disconnects before it completes? This should be true for functions that only return data. False for functions that affect other users, or change the database

Returns:
True for input OK. False if the input is bad and does not need to be further processed in the database threads.

virtual bool RakNet::CDKey_Use::RequiresLogin ( void   )  const [inline, virtual]

Does this function require logging into the server before it can be executed? If true, the user id and user handle will be automatically inferred by the last login by looking up the sender's system address. If false, the message should include the username so the database query can lookup which user is performing this operation.

Implements RakNet::Lobby2Message.
